explanation: The stage direction describes the setting and stage description with 'Au lever du rideau' indicating the beginning of the scene and 'Dix heures sonnent' indicating the time of the day. It also describes the position of Gontran on the stage, but the primary focus is on the setting and stage description.
stgdir: Au lever du rideau, Gontran est couché tout habillé sur le lit. Dix heures sonnent.
